content: NPU Knockout punches (1/2 to 4”) Knockout punches for punching ½ - 4” diameter conduit holes in up to 10-gauge steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Knockout tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Improve punching accuracy and productivity – alignment markings help you position the hole precisely Clean-cut holes – engineered to deliver a clean edge when used with Hilti cordless knockout punch tools, dies, and draw studs Wide diameter range – combine with die and draw stud versions to punch ½” up to 4” diameter conduit holes Applications Punching conduit holes in mild steel up to 10 gauge Punching conduit holes in stainless steel up to 12 gauge ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2196359 - Punch NPU P 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 1 Punch - 2196401 - Punch NPU P 1-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 1-1/2 Punch - 2196400 - Punch NPU P 1-1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 1-1/4 Punch - 2196402 - Punch NPU P 2” - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 2 Punch - 2354567 - Punch NPU P 3” - Package Size 1 pc - 2196358 - Punch NPU P 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 3/4 Punch - 2354565 - Punch NPU P 4” - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 4” Punch
